title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Choosing just one idea from the swarm of ideas buzzing loudly in your mind is an impossible feat today. Youre unlikely to appreciate any pressure to make a decision from any single circumstance or person. This interference might prompt you to grow agitated and even lash out when someone hasnt earned that penalty. The truth is you need to ease some of the strain in your own brain by removing yourself from the situation and quieting your thoughts. Theres no reason to push forward any initiative before youre ready. Pythagoras said, A fool is known by his speech, and a wise man by silence. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
